title: Spicy chicken baguette
ingredients: ['6 tablespoons water', '1 chicken breast, sliced', '2 mini sweet bite peppers, seeded and sliced', '2 spring onions, sliced', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '3 tablespoons garlic chilli sauce (I buy mine in pound shops)', '1 French baguette', "I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!® Light (optional)", "2 tablespoons light mayonnaise ( I used Hellmann's® Lighter than Light)", '2 teaspoons chopped chives']
